author: dirkv
msg: Bugzilla Bug 27320: DBCP 1.1 incompatible with Informix (driver doesn't support setReadOnly(...))
- Allow 3 values for the defaultReadOnly parameter: true, false and notset.
When the parameter isn't set then the Connection.setReadOnly method will not be called on activate.

author: dirkv
msg: Bugzilla Bug 24136: ClassCastException in DriverAdapterCPDS when setPoolPreparedStatements(true)
- make a DelegatingConnection in PooledConnectionImpl to avoid ClassCastException
